messages.subject: Q4 Planning Meeting Notes
messages.body_text:
Hi team,

Here are the notes from today's Q4 planning meeting:

1. Revenue targets confirmed at $2.5M
2. Hiring plan: 3 engineers, 1 PM
3. Product roadmap attached

Let me know if I missed anything.

Thanks,
Alice

--
Alice Smith
Head of Product
alice@example.com

messages.subject: Re: Q4 Planning Meeting Notes
messages.body_html:
Thanks Alice!

One addition - we also discussed the beta launch timeline:
  • Internal beta: Nov 1
  • Public beta: Nov 15
  • GA: Dec 1

I've also linked the budget spreadsheet for reference.

Best,
Bob

messages.subject: Re: Q4 Planning Meeting Notes
messages.body_text:
Looks good! I've updated the project tracker.

> Thanks Alice!
> One addition - we also discussed the beta launch timeline

Agreed on the timeline. I'll sync with engineering.

Carol

Sent from my iPhone
